name: DownloadSecureFile
description: Download a secure file to the agent machine
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: secureFile
inputs.label: Secure File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file name or GUID of the secure file to download to the agent machine. The file will be deleted after the pipeline runs.

inputs.name: retryCount
inputs.label: Retry Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional number of times to retry downloading a secure file if the download fails.

inputs.name: socketTimeout
inputs.label: Socket Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional timeout for a socket associated with downloading secure file request in ms.

outputVariables.name: secureFilePath
outputVariables.description: The location of the secure file that was downloaded.
